Name: AT SUNDOWN: Shots in the Dark
About the game: Features STEALTH DRIVEN ARENA COMBAT – Hide in the shadows and go in for the kill! ONLINE & LOCAL MULTIPLAYER – Compete with up to 4 friends in online deathmatch or at home in local deathmatch to see who will dominate! OFFLINE BOTS & SINGLE PLAYER CHALLENGE MODE – Play against bots or take on special challenges to prepare for the live showdown. 21 MAPS WITH TWISTS ON EACH ONE – Dominate your opponents across multiple maps, each with different light mechanics. Unlock new map types as you level up!
